DOC.brief_summary: 1.0 STUDY OBJECTIVE 1.1 PRIMARY OBJECTIVE - To compare two method polypropylene mesh attachment laparoscopic sacrocolpopexy ( LSC ) : running technique use self-anchoring 1 barb delay absorbable suture ( Quill™ SRS , Angiotech Pharmaceuticals , Inc. Vancouver , Canada ) versus interrupt technique use 0 non-barbed delay absorbable suture ( PDS II™ , Ethicon , Somerville , NJ , USA ) . 1.2 SECONDARY OBJECTIVE - To compare laparoscopic sacrocolpopexy anatomic failure rate 6 month post-operative follow-up use self-anchoring 1 barb delay absorbable suture ( Quill™ SRS , Angiotech Pharmaceuticals , Inc. Vancouver , Canada ) versus 0 non-barbed delay absorbable suture ( PDS II™ , Ethicon , Somerville , NJ , USA ) . The investigator also assess mesh erosion rate , cost , surgeon satisfaction rate . 2.0 HYPOTHESIS 2.1 Primary : 2.1.a . Attachment mesh use run technique self-anchoring 1 barb delay absorbable suture ( Quill™ SRS , Angiotech Pharmaceuticals , Inc. Vancouver , Canada ) faster standard fixation interrupt technique use 0 non-barbed delay absorbable suture ( PDS II™ , Ethicon , Somerville , NJ , USA ) . 2.2 Secondary : 2.2.a . Attachment mesh use run technique self-anchoring 1 barb delay absorbable suture ( Quill™ SRS , Angiotech Pharmaceuticals , Inc. Vancouver , Canada ) less costly standard fixation interrupt technique use 0 non-barbed delay absorbable suture ( PDS II™ , Ethicon , Somerville , NJ , USA ) . 2.2.b . Failure rate mesh erosion rate technique equally low . 2.2.c . Surgeons prefer barbed run technique interrupt technique base subjective surgeon satisfaction questionnaire .
DOC.brief_title: Affixing Polypropylene Mesh Using Barbed Suture ( Quill™ Srs ) During Laparoscopic Sacrocolpopexy Randomized Controlled Trial ( Quill Lsc )
DOC.criteria: INCLUSION CRITERIA > 18 year old Undergoing LSC without procedure pelvic organ prolapse incontinence Willing return followup visit Written inform consent obtain subject Must robotic assist laparoscopic sacrocolpopexy Decline participate Pregnant contemplating future pregnancy Unable participate inform consent process
